data.text: @EU_Commission amerikalı olmadığınız için şükür'dur trump escort'tan karakter arayışı gelenektir bazısı için adamlık

@EU_Commission Sure! My friend @joseprull has a great sense of humor and is such a great professional. He is this type of person who knows his surroundings and therefore plans and enacts policies that work, not just on the paper, but also in real life.

@EU_Commission Sure! My friend @toni_comin is the one you need. He is the best at finding new strategies to achieve any goal. He has both the talent to persist and the talent to adapt to any situation. In a continuously evolving world, these kind of people are the ones we need.

@EU_Commission Sure! My friend @quimforn was in front of Catalan police last year when we suffered those terrible terror attacks. He is a lovely family man, I believe that makes him so much stronger, because he sees the importance of protecting his people and also being tolerant with others.

@EU_Commission Sure! My good friend @ForcadellCarme is the most humble and professional President of a Parliament one can have. Maybe you need one at @EUparliament? It doesn't seem your Parliament has a good reputation at the moment, what is it you are doing there exactly?
@EU_Commission Sure! My friend @dolorsbassac she is awesome. She has an impressive CV within Catalan politics and has a special talent in defending workers, women and migrants rights.

@EU_Commission Sure! My friend @raulromeva is great at connecting with people around the world. He is a great person and transfers that to his political career. Has an impressive entrepreneur spirit which helps him connecting ideas, people and companies.
